import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import Navbar from "./../Components/Navbar" const PaymentScreen = () => { const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState("PayPal") const navigate = useNavigate() const handleChange = e => { const { value } = e.target setPaymentMethod(value) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() navigate("/placeorder") } return ( <>

SELECT PAYMENT METHOD

) } export default PaymentScreen
